name: qstorage
description: Partial wrapper around mongodb API which employs promises instead of callbacks.

scripts.test: coffee -co js . && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 1000 --recursive js/tests -R spec -r should && cp README.md package.json js/ && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Constantin Titarenko
